patch.data: Nothing large this week! Just a small nerf to Raina and some item tuning! Enjoy the beta this weekend, folks!

• Base discipline resource increased to 25 discipline regenerated per 5 seconds, up from 15 discipline regenerated per 5 seconds.
  • The cooldown on the heal component of Raina's passive has been increased to 4 seconds, up from 3 seconds.
  • Bastion of the North (W)
    • The amount of Discipline drained per second by this ability, while active, has been increased to 12.5 Discipline per second, up from 6.6 Discipline per second.
• The range at which the projectiles will bounce to other targets has been reduced to 375, down from 450.

• The cost of this item has been increased to 2850, up from 2830.
  • The amount of Haste this item gives has been reduced to 50, down from 65.

General Fixes / Updates

General

  • Fixed several user reported crashes.
